*div1 type="summary"* *p*Martin Allen to Austin, May 12, 1825. Concerning land. */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Natchitoches*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="05-12-1825">12th May 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir by this safe oppertunity I must trouble you with another letter as I have wrote to you so often respecting my *location_mentioned*Land*/location_mentioned*, and other things: I requested you in several of my letters to you to write me a few lines respecting my Land, if you received my Last letter which I think was dated sometime in *date_mentioned n="04-xx-1825">April */date_mentioned*I expressed greate uneasiness about my Land from a letter I had just received from *person_mentioned*Mr. Lynch*/person_mentioned* stating that you had givin away my *location_mentioned*Labbour*/location_mentioned*,—and he gave me no positive answer respecting by League which I could not conceive how that could be the Case as you entered my *location_mentioned*Labbour */location_mentioned*in *date_mentioned n="07-xx-1824">July */date_mentioned*last in my name and told me it should be secure to me and named in the same title with my League—and I had all ways undeistood by *person_mentioned*Mr Lynch*/person_mentioned* that my title was safe in the *location_mentioned*office */location_mentioned*I have received a letter since from *person_mentioned*mr, Lynch*/person_mentioned* by the hand of *person_mentioned*Mr. Aulsbury*/person_mentioned* that gave me more satisfaction respecting it he informed me that my *location_mentioned*League */location_mentioned*was safe and a first rate one by your own information and my *location_mentioned*Labbour*/location_mentioned* had been taken through mistake, which Can be All rectifyed when I come on which will be amediately, *person_mentioned*Mr, Aulsbuy*/person_mentioned* and his *person_mentioned*familey*/person_mentioned* and myself and my *person_mentioned*familey */person_mentioned*are all Comeing In Companey we will start in afew days*/p*
*p*I kneede not write aney thing of the knews of this *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*as *person_mentioned*Mr, Cable*/person_mentioned* will hand you this letter himself directly from this *location_mentioned*place*/location_mentioned*: You Can ask him what difficulties I have in Countered and what Losses 1 have sustained in trying to git to my Land in that *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*which I hope to afect in next *date_mentioned n="06-xx-1825">month */date_mentioned*without some unavoidable accident—I have wrote repetedly to my sons to make aney nessary improvements on my *location_mentioned*Land */location_mentioned*that you would direct; if you should go on to the*location_mentioned* in- terier*/location_mentioned* before I arrive you will please to give my deede to *person_mentioned*James Lynch*/person_mentioned* for me. do all you Can for me and you will be amply rewarded by your friend */p* *p**person_mentioned*Martin Allen*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
